On 20 Nov 2023, at 2:28 pm, Ozeken, Nikki <Nikki.Ozeken@sonova.com> wrote:


Hi Guys,

Can we please have the following materials added to https://phonakmarketing.com.au/well-hearing/

Is it possible to have this completed by this Friday 24 November?

Brief:

  1. Please create a new category titled ' 8. Cognition campaign'
  2. In this category, please add the following tiles:

· Evidence

· Clinic enablement tools

· Consumer leaflet

· Campaign guide (file to come)

· DL flyer

· Postcard Posters

· A4 signs

· Pull-up banners

· Emails

· Blogs

· Website content

· Social content (additional file to follow shortly)

· Key visuals

Please find the files here: <image001.png> Cognition campaign materials

Please note: I will send the highlighted as separate docs very shortly.

Best regards,

Nikki Ozeken
